div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

font-family: arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif; font-size: 10px; line-height: 12px; color: #ffffff; text-align: center;

h6.span: Welcome to Life Skills Center of Pontiac

div.p:
Welcome! Thank you for visiting us online. Here at Life Skills Center of Pontiac, we believe that the partnership between parents, the community, and the school is an integral part of success for our students. We not only encourage parent involvement, we NEED it! Throughout the school year, we hope to see the results of our parents' efforts. Whether helping individuals and small groups in the classroom or volunteering at special events, our Life Skills Center parents play a vital role in their student's education.
As partners, we share the common goal of giving each student one of the greatest opportunities in the world: earning their high school diploma. If you are looking for acareer working as part of a dynamic and creative team to provide revolutionaryand innovative educational programming to students, this could be the place for you! Please click the image below or check out our "Careers" tab for information on our current job openings.

a.title: Click Here
a.style: font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: medium; color: rgb(33, 38, 51); text-decoration-line: underline;

div.div: Life Skills Center of Pontiac is now on Facebook! Please follow us on Facebook to receive updates on events and important announcements at the school. READ MORE...
Our office is open for registration M-F from 8:00 AM to 3:00 PM For questions regarding enrollment, please call 248-499-7421 or contact us through our website. READ MORE...

Our first day of the new school year is July 9, 2018. Fall break will be from August 23-September 9. School resumes September 10. Please see the calendar for other important dates for the 2018-2019 school year. READ MORE...

div.li: 142 Auburn Ave., Pontiac, MI 48342 | Phone: 248-499-7421 | Fax: 248-499-7456
